episodes.title: 10 Years In A Cult - Dr. Lalich - Ep 78
episodes.description: Dr. Janja Lalich is a world-renowned expert in cultic studies. She has written half a dozen books on the inner workings of cults and has appeared in countless documentaries. She was also part of a leftist cult for almost 10 years. We talk about her experiences, her books and the future of her work.  Support Dr. Lalich and her work: https://janjalalich.com/ 0:00 Intro 0:50 Dr. Lalich's Serbian Roots 4:50 One's upbringing in relation to cults 8:50 People likely to get into cults 11:50 How Dr. Lalich was recruited 17:05 How does a cult make money 19:20 Normal day as a cult member 24:20 Criminality in cults 27:50 LSD cults in the 70s 34:50 What Dr. Lalich is currently working on 39:00 Jehovah's Witnesses. Nelly almost getting recruited 47:00 Outro
